title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change immediately.
OB: The label font size does not affect the height of the label.
EB: The label height should be adjusted to match the font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label.
2. Change the label's font size to "18 points".
3. Verify that the label's height is not adjusted to match the new font size.
